list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Work Done: - Adding purchase history to the project activities and layouts.
- Adding the node of the history of purchase is saved.
- Retrying the purchase data from the node and presenting it on nested recyclerView.
- Removing the node with customer order data on confirmation of order.
- Design layout updates.
- Notes: - github.com/kimkimani/Nested_RecyclerView
* Add items: - PurchaseHistoryActivity.java - AdapterHistory.java - AdapterItemsHistory.java - ic_order_history.xml - activity_purchase_history.xml - row_items_history.xml - row_purchase_history.xml - History.java
* Updated items: - CompanyActivity.java - MenuActivity.java - OrderViewActivity.java - AdapterItemsOrder.java - Orders.java - OrdersItems.java - activity_menu.xml - activity_new_item_company.xml - activity_setting_company.xml - activity_setting_user.xml - row_items_order.xml
* Removed: - ...

task.summary:
Work Done: - Configuration and adding the project to the firebase database.
- adding the Splash Activity component.
- adding the necessary libraries to use the Firebase data base.
Notes: - ...
* Add items: - activity_splash.xml - SplashActivity.java - google-services.json
* Updated items: - AndroidManifest.xml - build.gradle.kts - libs.versions.toml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done:
- adding the logging layout components.
- updating the handler.
- adding thumb and track to the color change of the Switch.
Notes: - ...
* Add items: - AuthenticationActivity.java - activity_authentication.xml - dimens.xml - img_logo.jpg - img_perfil.png - dw_edit_text
* Updated items: - activity_splash.xml - SplashActivity.java - strings.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done:
- updating the user model to save the name, email, and user type in the real-time database.
- adding visibility to Liner layout, Switch Compat and EditText.
- adding the activity path, the application is redirected to the intended activity when the user type is selected.
Notes: - ...
* Add items: - CompanyActivity.java - activity_home.xml - Constants.java - FirebaseConfiguration.java - HomeActivity.java - UserFirebase.java
* Updated items: - activity_authentication.xml - activity_intro.xml - IntroActivity.java - UserFirebase.java
* Removed: - ...

Work Done:
- updating the user model to save the name, email, and user type in the real-time database.
- adding visibility to Liner layout, Switch Compat and EditText.
- adding the activity path, the application is redirected to the intended activity when the user type is selected.
Notes: - ...
* Add items: - CompanyActivity.java - activity_home.xml - Constants.java - FirebaseConfiguration.java - HomeActivity.java - UserFirebase.java
* Updated items: - activity_authentication.xml - activity_intro.xml - IntroActivity.java - UserFirebase.java
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - adding search view with expanded view on click icon search her changes icon type and SearchView on toolbarClient.
- adding the toolbar to client and company layouts.
- adding the necessary drawable icons to the project.
- setting the items menu for visibility when selecting the search view.
- adding the lint error verification.
Notes: - https://www.materialpalette.com/
* Add items: - build.gradle.kts - activity_authentication.xml - activity_company.xml - AuthenticationActivity.java - ClientActivity.java - colors.xml - CompanyActivity.java - IntroActivity.java - strings.xml - themes.xml
* Updated items: - activity_client.xml - ic_add_circle_24.xml - ic_cancel_24.xml - ic_delete_24.xml - ic_search_24.xml - menu_client.xml - menu_company.xml - toolbar_client.xml - toolbar_company.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - adding the companies node to realtime database and retrieving the created data.
- adding components to project recyclerView, CurrencyEditText, CircleImageView, Picasso, MaskEditText.
- adding the model Company.
- adding activities and creating the xml view of components.
- making some design layout updates.
Notes:
* Add items: - build.gradle.kts - activity_authentication.xml - activity_company.xml - AndroidManifest.xml - AuthenticationActivity.java - ClientActivity.java - colors.xml - CompanyActivity.java - ClientActivity.java - Constants.java - dimens.xml - IntroActivity.java - menu_client.xml - menu_company.xml - themes.xml - toolbar_client.xml - toolbar_company.xml - toolbar_title.xml - UserFirebase.java
* Updated items: - activity_setting_company.xml - activity_setting_user.xml - AnimationsSearch.java - Company.java - ic_add_a_photo_84.xml - ic_arrow_back_24.xml - ic_broken_image_24.xml - NewItemCompanyActivity.java - SettingCompanyActivity.java - SettingUserActivity.java - toolbar_title.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - adding some necessary files to the project.
Notes:
* Add items: - assetWizardSettings.xml - local.properties - workspace.xml
* Updated items: - ...
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Adding necessary components to create the NewItemCompanyActivity. - Adding permission to use the internet. - Adding the model to save the data products on the database. - Saving the product data in the Firebase real-time database.
Notes:
* Add items: - Products.java
* Updated items: - activity_new_item_company.xml - AndroidManifest.xml - Company.java - Constants.java - NewItemCompanyActivity.java - SettingCompanyActivity.java - strings.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Adding necessary components to create the NewItemCompanyActivity. - Adding permission to use the internet. - Adding the model to save the data products on the database. - Saving the product data in the Firebase real-time database.
Notes:
* Add items: - Products.java
* Updated items: - activity_new_item_company.xml - AndroidManifest.xml - Company.java - Constants.java - NewItemCompanyActivity.java - SettingCompanyActivity.java - strings.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Adding necessary components to create the NewItemCompanyActivity. - Adding permission to use the internet. - Adding the model to save the data products on the database. - Saving the product data in the Firebase real-time database.
Notes:
* Add items: - Products.java
* Updated items: - activity_new_item_company.xml - AndroidManifest.xml - Company.java - Constants.java - NewItemCompanyActivity.java - SettingCompanyActivity.java - strings.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Adding necessary components to create the MenuActivity, divisor_menu.xml, rows, and RecyclerView. - Adding the logged user name to the toolbar. - Add the calls to the Firebase RealTime database to list companies and products. - Add the calls to the Firebase RealTime database to save the data on the user, company, and products. - Moving the animations search into a class. - Adding the class SysTemUi and creating the hide navigation functions to hide components of the Android API version.
Notes:
* Add items: - MenuActivity.java - AdapterCompanies.java - SysTemUi.java - activity_menu.xml - divisor_menu.xml - row_companies.xml
* Updated items: - AuthenticationActivity.java - ClientActivity.java - CompanyActivity.java - IntroActivity.java - NewItemCompanyActivity.java - SettingCompanyActivity.java - SettingUserActivity.java - Constants.java - Companies.java - Products.java - Users.java - AnimationsSearch.java - ic_broken_image_24.xml - img_profile.png - activity_authentication.xml - activity_client.xml - activity_setting_user.xml - colors.xml - dimens.xml - strings.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Adding the components to the user's settings layout. - Add the customer model class with the necessary functions and variables. - Adding the node customers to the real-time database. - Add the class activity to user settings to save, retrieve, and verify the data the user has selected. - Retrieving the user name from the Users node and setting it on the toolbar activities.
Notes: -...
* Add items: - Customer.java
* Updated items: - ClientActivity.java - CompanyActivity.java - NewItemCompanyActivity.java - SettingCompanyActivity.java - SettingUserActivity.java - AdapterCompanies.java - Constants.java - Companies.java - Users.java - activity_authentication.xml - activity_setting_user.xml - activity_setting_company.xml - strings.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Adding customer orders and generating a user cart list. - Adding customers and customer orders nodes to the Firebase database and populating the model with customer, item, and order data. - Adding the option for customers to view their cart list of selected items. - Using the alert dialog, record the customer's input quantity and the current order, as well as the total quantity of goods and the total value, to the Firebase database. - eliminating the initialization of the keyboard from currencyEditTex.
Notes: -...
* Add items: - OrderViewActivity.java - AdapterItemsOrder.java - ItemOrders.java - Orders.java - ProgressDialog.java - dw_divisor.xml - activity_order_view.xml - dialog_amount_order.xml - dialog_progress.xml - row_items_order.xml - menu_menu.xml
* Updated items: - MenuActivity.java - SettingCustomerActivity.java - MenuActivity.java - Constants.java - activity_menu.xml - activity_setting_user.xml - row_companies.xml - row_products.xml - colors.xml - dimens.xml
* Removed: - ...

Work Done: - Design layout's update
- Notes: - ...
* Add items: - AdapterItemsOrder - activity_order_view - row_items_order
* Updated items: - ...
* Removed: - ...
